alert.note: Alert for Prentiss; Tippah; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Union, southeastern Tippah and western Prentiss Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1145 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Keownville, or 9 miles southeast of Ripley, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Booneville, Baldwyn, Jumpertown, Keownville, Wheeler, Dumas, Rienzi, Graham, Jericho, Blackland, Gaston, Molino, Clarysville, Geeville, Locum and Frankstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
